frontmatter.author: Paulo Coelho
frontmatter.title: Everyone seems to have a clear idea of how other people should lead their lives, but none about his or her own.

frontmatter.author: Albert Einstein
frontmatter.title: As our circle of knowledge expands, so does the circumference of darkness surrounding it.

frontmatter.author: Kahlil Gibran
frontmatter.title: [W]hat is word knowledge but a shadow of wordless knowledge?
